title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\DataProfileAction\PubSubNotification
name: PubSubNotification
description:
Send a Pub/Sub message into the given Pub/Sub topic to connect other systems to data profile generation. The message payload data will be the byte serialization of DataProfilePubSubMessage.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.DataProfileAction.PubSubNotification

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.topic
params.description: Cloud Pub/Sub topic to send notifications to. Format is projects/{project}/topics/{topic}.

params.name: data.event
params.description: The type of event that triggers a Pub/Sub. At most one PubSubNotification per EventType is permitted.

params.name: data.pubsub_condition
params.description: Conditions (e.g., data risk or sensitivity level) for triggering a Pub/Sub.

params.name: data.detail_of_message
params.description: How much data to include in the Pub/Sub message. If the user wishes to limit the size of the message, they can use resource_name and fetch the profile fields they wish to. Per table profile (not per column).

methods.description:
